ResearchProjectDef.label: imperium drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of various mind altering substances common throughout the imperium, from fenrisian ale to combat stims.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cogitator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of a cogitator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: grimworld manufacturing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of materials like rockcrete and plascrete.

ResearchProjectDef.label: relic component
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of relic components, a type of high-tech components that many advanced Imperium technologies rely on.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasma generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of the plasma generator, a massive structure that converts uranium into electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: grimworld blast doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of blast doors, which are super thick doors that can take an extremely long time to open when unpowered.
